projectPurpose: To provide a lightweight, self-hostable, and Bitwarden-client-compatible server implementation for password management.

alternatives.name: Bitwarden (Official)
alternatives.license: Open Source (Server: AGPL-3.0, Clients: GPL-3.0, some proprietary modules)

alternatives.name: 1Password
mainFeatures: Secure vault for multiple item types

marketPositioning: Vaultwarden is positioned as a lightweight, open-source, self-hostable server alternative to the official Bitwarden server. It specifically targets users who want to self-host their password vault on resource-constrained devices while utilizing the full-featured and widely available official Bitwarden clients. Its compatibility with Bitwarden clients is a key differentiator compared to other self-hosted solutions with their own client ecosystems. It competes with the official Bitwarden self-hosted option by offering lower resource requirements and with proprietary cloud services by providing a self-hosted, privacy-focused alternative.
